Text: Viking press releases of October th and October rd PRJANdoc PROctdoc You may be interested in the attached press releases which Viking has issued over the past few business days In these uncertain times a healthy balance sheet a solid team of talent performing properties and a proactive hedging program all contribute to Viking having a stable cash flow and distribution forecast through the year Viking is well positioned to realize on opportunities as they may arise in these periods of volatility In managing the assets of the Trust through all phases of the commodity price cycles we continue to focus on the current yield and long term return objectives for Viking Unitholders Regards akp
